title: Trump surveys prototype border walls
text:
Trump surveys prototype border walls Tuesday, March 13, 2018 - 01:13 
Republican President Donald Trump calls on the U.S. Congress to fund a wall along the U.S. border with Mexico as he checks out prototypes for the border barrier in the Democratic stronghold of California. Diane Hodges reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Republican President Donald Trump calls on the U.S. Congress to fund a wall along the U.S. border with Mexico as he checks out prototypes for the border barrier in the Democratic stronghold of California.
